title: Create a Budget Pacing Report
description: An account manager needs to check if a monthly campaign budget is on track to spend correctly.

tasks.description: Identify the total monthly budget for the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the total budget is $10,000.

tasks.description: Determine how many days have passed in the current month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that it is the 15th day of a 30-day month (50% elapsed).

tasks.description: Pull the month-to-date spend for the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the campaign has spent $4,000.

tasks.description: Compare the percentage of budget spent (40%) to the percentage of time elapsed (50%) and report that the campaign is under-pacing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the pacing status and recommends increasing daily budgets.
